text: Nikolay Ivanovich Zhukovsky (; ( in Ufa – ) was a Russian revolutionary and narodnik, a follower of Mikhail Bakunin; he was born in Ufa and died in Geneva. ==References== Category:1833 births Category:1895 deaths Category:People from Ufa Category:Russian revolutionaries Category:Imperial Moscow University alumni
title: Nikolay Zhukovsky (revolutionary)
